A fully customizable waitlist template designed to help you collect emails and build anticipation for your product launch.

Option to choose between a fullscreen or splitscreen layout.

### Why Choose This Template?

- ⏱️ Save 100+ hours of work
- 🫰 Easy to configure and change
- 🎨 Beautiful design
- 🌐 Optimized for search engines
- 📱 Responsive design
- 📦 1-click download and setup
- 📝 5 minutes to update the text and images
- 🚀 Deploy live to vercel

### Features Included

- **Modern Design**: Fully responsive layout built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS.
- **Email Collection**: Secure form with Zod validation and toast notifications.
- **Analytics Integration**: Built-in Google Analytics support for tracking metrics.
- **SEO Optimized**: Customizable metadata and search engine best practices.
- **Easy Configuration**: Simple content and appearance customization.
